name: readify
description: This Project involves refactoring a MERN stack book search engine to use GraphQL with Apollo Server instead of a RESTful API, including modifying the authentication middleware, creating an Apollo Provider for the front end, and deploying the application to Render with MongoDB Atlas.

scripts.develop: concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i

author: Devan Ash
